text:
Danièle Hoffman-Rispal (22 June 1951 – 2020) was a French politician of Jewish descent. She was a member of the National Assembly of France from 2002 to 2012. She represented the city of Paris. Hoffman-Rispal was a member of the Socialist Party.
Hoffman-Rispal died either late 15 April or early 16 April 2020 in Paris at the age of 68.
